release.description: Disease search also in OMIM and MeSH
release.action: Searches of diseases are now performed not only against EFO but also against OMIM and MeSH. The old method (BioportalWsAdapter.getDiseaseByName) is now deprecated, also because its name was misleading (can search by ID too).
Introduced workaround to ignore obsolete EFO entries, which have been deprecated in favour of orphanet entries.
Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), ep-domain, biobabel-core and junit.
Added MeSH to the enumeration of BioPortal ontologies.
